title: Coastal Rydges Mackay Studio Escape near Great Barrier Reef & Just 90 Minutes from Proserpine
description: Discover Queensland's subtropical rainforests, pristine national parks and off-shore tropical islands when you stay at Rydges Mackay Suites, located in the heart of the city. In between exploring the nearby rainforest or swimming among colourful corals in the Great Barrier Reef, you can rest and recharge in style, thanks to the hotel's fabulous facilities. Keep up your fitness regimen at the onsite gym, swim laps in the indoor pool, and enjoy an ice cold drink or a delightful meal at Moss on Wood, where creative and innovative dishes are set to tantalise your tastebuds.
